      • getHotelsWithFreeRoomsWithParameters

        java.util.ArrayList<Hotel> getHotelsWithFreeRoomsWithParameters(java.lang.String country,
                                                              java.lang.String city,
                                                              int size,
                                                              float maxPrice,
                                                              java.util.Date beginDate,
                                                              java.util.Date endDate)
        returns hotels with free rooms based on certain parameters
        Parameters:
        country - the name of the country the hotel should be in
        city - the name of the city the hotel should be in
        size - the size of the room necessary
        maxPrice - the highest possible price
        beginDate - date of arrival
        endDate - date of departure
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all hotels within these parameters with free rooms
